values:
bitches, i will be spending the next five years of my life at tulane university.

after that, i don't know.  

i've been doing some thinking lately about the various males who have come into and ot of my life.   and i miss most of them.  i guess you do a lot of thinking when you make big decisions.  

anyway, i'll be around for the summer. so call me.

yep - that's what i've been to.
and the wedding count is about to go up, and i'm pissed because i really really really don't want to go. i mean, really. REALLY. i want to go to p'cola with laura. i don't want to play dress up for my redneck relations.

i'm feeling a little light-headed and the lower half of my face is tingly.

why do you never feel any different when you reach certain landmarks, and why do you sometimes feel like a whole new person quite suddenly?

in other news, next semester just might rock...

i'm off to a party, disguised as velma from scooby-doo.
goodwill is good to me.

so my old friend drew got sent off to boot camp.
and i don't know exactly how to feel.
because he was my friend
(byron calls it a "soft spot" and i call it a connection)
but he really wasn't the greatest of characters.
.
and right now i'm procrastinating even more than i already did by waiting until 9 pm to start the damn pride and prejudice essay.

today i went shopping. 
and got my car fixed.
and saw the wallace and gromit movie.
and bought something for byron for no reason.
i think that might add up to a good day.

sometimes being in a relationship is harder than being single.
and when i say sometimes, i mean usually.
.
i still need my car back.
.
i'm stuck at home doing homework while my friends are rocking out.

i need coffee...
and a new watch.
and my car back.

THREE NAMES YOU GO BY:
1. Katie
2. KT
3. Katherine Louisiana
THREE SCREEN NAMES YOU HAVE HAD:
1. dancingdixie123
2. babydollgrunge
3.
THREE THINGS YOU LIKE ABOUT YOURSELF:
1. i am a vegetarian
2. i stand up for what i believe in
3. i can do what i need to do
THREE THINGS YOU HATE ABOUT YOURSELF:
1. i procrastinate
2. i am too emotional sometimes
3. no self control. none. whatsoever
THREE PARTS OF YOUR HERITAGE:
1. finnish
2. choctaw
3. southern baptist/redneck
THREE THINGS THAT SCARE YOU:
1. losing my man
2. drowning
3. being chemically dependent
THREE OF YOUR EVERYDAY ESSENTIALS:
1. water
2. common sense
3. car with gas
THREE THINGS YOU ARE WEARING RIGHT NOW:
1. green checkerboard kicks
2. the bestest sweater ever
3. against me! shirt
THREE OF YOUR FAVORITE BANDS (or artists):
1. bright eyes 
2. brand new
3. poison the well
THREE OF YOUR FAVORITE SONGS AT PRESENT:
1. against me! - from her lips to god's ear
2. bright eyes - first day of my life
3. alexisonfire - polaroids of polar bears
THREE NEW THINGS YOU WANT TO TRY IN THE NEXT 12 MONTHS
1. being truly happy and settled down in a relationship
2. getting out of here for good
3. chilling out
THREE THINGS YOU WANT IN A RELATIONSHIP (love is a given):
1. a good sense of humor
2. patience because i'm a spaz
3. respect
THREE THINGS ABOUT THE OPPOSITE SEX THAT APPEAL TO YOU:
1. sense of humor
2. eyes
3. not frontin' the dank
THREE THINGS YOU JUST CAN'T DO:
1. give up control
2. eat overcooked veggies
3. do a new york accent
THREE OF YOUR FAVORITE HOBBIES:
1. writing
2. photography
3. kissing boys (ok, one boy in particular)
THREE THINGS YOU WANT TO DO REALLY BADLY RIGHT NOW:
1. but the MC Paul Barman CD off iTunes
2. get my vertebrae adjusted
3. stop eating these nerds... but they're too delicious
THREE CAREERS YOU'RE CONSIDERING:
1. art historian
2. literature
3. theatre
THREE PLACES YOU WANT TO GO ON VACATION:
1. annapolis, maryland
2. england
3. italy
THREE KID'S NAMES
1. devon
2. aurelia
3. gwenyth
THREE THINGS YOU WANT TO DO BEFORE YOU DIE:
1. take a good look at the louvre
2. write something significant
3. change someone's life

i wish my dad would get out of my face.
i don't want to go to alabama.

i hate this place more than ever.

in other news, i love my boyfriend more than ever.

thank jesus i'm home again.
i just signed up to take another SATII.
why do i like pain so damn much?
.
.
.
HAPPY BIR'DAY TO MY SPECIAL FRIEND DANIELLE!!

i'm home for the day.  laundry. free meals.
.
.
.
if i didn't need clean clothes, i wouldn't put up with my dad's looting jokes.
i was getting by borrowing byron's t-shirts, but i think washing my clothes is a better idea.
.
.
.
i want a smoothie and my bed back.

so i've moved out of my house for a bit.
i'm staying with spiffin griffin.
and mr. freddy.
detroit was a barrel of fun. can't quite say the same for katrina, but whatever. our power has been on since yesterday. if anyone needs a shower or A/C, feel free to come over.

i'm leaving for detroit today!!

YES.

i'll be back sunday. 

i love traveling....

it gets pretty damn hot in alabama.

suddenly, my mom's job has turned from a good thing into a sucky thing.

school tomorrow.  test tomorrow. both = thumbs down.

however, work tomorrow. byron tomorrow. both = thumbs up!!

i have discovered melatonin.

thank you, danielle.

tomorrow i'm going to see The Tempest with my man.

someone special still thinks i'm pretty.

TEN random things about me-
10. i find stupid humor very humorous
9. i like fried okra
8. i wish i had a trampoline
7. i also wish i could remember my dreams better
6. i don't take compliments well
5. i think that elements are really ugly
4. i care more than i let on
3. i don't like spiders
2. i REALLY don't like feeling trapped
1. i love loud music

NINE ways to win my heart-
9. making me laugh
8. being my friend first and foremost
7. not being high-maintenence
6. being thoughtful and smart
5. having fun with my parents
4. not making fun of my not eating meat
3. knowing when to be funny
2. knowing when to shut up and kiss me
1. always being real, no fronts

EIGHT of my favorite movies-
8. napoleon dynamite
7. high fidelity
6. almost famous
5. the devil's advocate
4. monty python and the holy grail
3. life of brian
2. hamlet (the ethan hawke version)
1. empire records

SEVEN things that annoy me-
7. bad smells
6. silly girls
5. anyone who is high-maintenance
4. getting stressed out over stupid stuff
3. bad drivers
2. being hungry but not feeling like eating anything
1. conservatives

SIX things I wanna do before I die-
6. fall in love in a foreign country
5. go back to england
4. write a book
3. live in istanbul
2. have the time of my life
1. change one person's life

FIVE things I am afraid of-
5. being absolutely alone
4. unrequited love
3. what might be in the dark
2. forgetting who i am
1. natural disasters

FOUR of my favorite items in my room-
4. my bed
3. my camera
2. my cd's
1. my curtains

THREE things I do everyday-
3. brush my teeth
2. sleep more than i should
1. procrastinate

TWO things I want to do right now-
2. eat something good
1. get rid of this headache

ONE person I want to see right now-
1. laura

yesterday was good.
i have a job in fairhope.
and someone thinks i'm pretty.

travelodges in podunk, pennsylvania, run by indians are... seedy.

boys with piercings are very attractive. too attractive for me.

surviving two weeks in a car with my father is a miracle that is unlikely to ever happen again.

coming home to see people who matter and sleep in my own bed is quite nice.

new haven looks a lot like cambridge.

i love yale like a fat kid loves cake.

i want this school. bad.

i'm home saturday, which is far too soon for my tastes.

new york is full of crazy people and damn good food.

i could get used to this place.

duke is pretty. very pretty.
it is also pretty expensive. very pretty expensive.

annapolis. it's not bad here, but the drive nearly killed me.

lesson 1: though the atlanta bypass may seem like a good idea, it is NOT. A. GOOD. IDEA.

lesson 2: waffle house folk are always friendly. not always attractive, but always friendly.

lesson 3: sleeping is by far the best way to pass a road trip.

tomorrow, i tour duke and drive to annapolis to tour st. john's. then, we're off to new york and sarah lawrence!! hurrah!!

well, the kings ran.
we loaded up our food and dogs and got the hell out of dodge.
currently holed up the good old University of South Alabama.
And our power hasn't even gone out.
.
we've been playing poker, blackjack, and egyptian ratscrew.
and sleeping, of course.
we're going home at 6.
.
tomorrow, it's time to REALLY get the hell out of dodge.

i don't hate my haircut anymore.
i think we're staying again. 
apparently, the kings don't run unless they have to.
we're leaving for my road trip as soon as this thing blows over.
.
.
.
literally.

i hate my haircut.
i need a job in fairhope 
so i can pay my own chiropractic bills.

she's leaving again.

best friends means friends forever.

coldplay - the scientist

Come up to meet you, 
Tell you I'm sorry, 
You don't know how lovely you are. 

I had to find you, 
Tell you I need you, 
Tell you I set you apart. 

Tell me your secrets, 
And ask me your questions, 
Oh, let's go back to the start. 

Runnin' in circles, 
Comin' up tails, 
Its only science apart. 

Nobody said it was easy, 
It's such a shame for us to part. 
Nobody said it was easy, 
No one ever said it would be this hard. 
Oh, take me back to the start. 

I was just guessing, 
At numbers and figures, 
Pulling the puzzles apart. 

Questions of science, 
Science and progress, 
Do not speak as loud as my heart. 

Tell me you love me, 
Come back and haunt me, 
Oh, when I rush to the start. 

Runnin' in circles, 
Chasin' tails, 
Comin' back as we are. 

Nobody said it was easy, 
Oh, it's such a shame for us to part. 
Nobody said it was easy, 
No one ever said it would be so hard. 
I'm goin' back to the start.

they just took my grandmother to the hospital with chest pains.

damnit, i just can't take this.

i have lost all my patience.
i can't beat this by myself.
i want pills. i want them now.

toots the cat likes me. i like cats. i'm feeding him while kathy is in cancun. we sit in kathy's empty house and i pet him and he purrs. he's a very comforting cat.

this college roadtrip is stressing me out.

i like money.

some people just can't handle me.

ballet is over.
work makes me tired.
boys piss me off.
family guy makes me laugh.

damn, i could use a cigarette.

i went back to work. i got interrogated about my mother. i'm a very proud person, and i really hate swallowing my pride like that. but i need the money. the money is worth the lost dignity.

wow that sounds like a lie. 

i wish i could keep dancing.

and goddamnit, i hate mobile. that city deserves to be sodomized. it has an infestation of mental deficiencies.

ballet is miserable.
my love life is non-existant.
i'm going back to work on monday.

but strangely, i am content with all of this shit.

i will have money, my mom is taking a job at South Baldwin, and the SAT II's weren't so horrible as i imagined.

i have my own personal soundtrack now.

um. i am a hermit.

other than that, i go back to work on monday.

the last ninety minutes of my junior year will be spent in the company of why-kwi, 8 mile, and coleman.

mmm... 
first block: chocolate mousse and the triplets of belleville (the weirdest ass movie i've ever seen).
break: emo pictures. 
second block: sugar cookies, interpol, and impending freedom.

in physics.

once again, doing nothing.

but this time, i have a blue coconut creamslush from sonic, aka meccah, to keep me occupied.

exactly one day left.
four blocks to freedom!!

so now i get to go take pictures of pretty girls in pretty tutus 
and i could be doing that
but i'm not.

and i miss it.

made an A in physics.
met megrez's man.
officially approved megrez's man.
ate sushi for dinner.
went to ballet practice, but no one else showed.
went for ice cream instead (a good call.)
almost finished my research paper.
watched the o.c. season finale.

am now going to bed. finally. 
tomorrow all of this shit will be over...

7 minutes to the bell
6 hours of sleep
5 pounds gained
4 two-bite brownies
3 cups of coffee
2 graduations
1 migraine headache
and a partridge in a fucking pear tree

spent my sunday doing research on the warren court, the civil rights movement, and the return to conservatism.

ronald reagan can bite me.

reah's party was fabulous. water balloon fight, cold wet crotch all night, eating ghetto burritos, the first half of national treasure... rock on for randomness.  god i'm gonna miss my seniors...

in other news, SHOWBREAD = TONITE!!

in physics.

doing jack shit.

so i got my thursday out to counteract matt (AKA 6 Mile)'s horrible rap bullshit.

hurrah for coleman, although he did try to pawn me off to his first block again today:
"hey all you dudes!! it's a chick inspection... look 'er over, and after she leaves we'll talk about A's on projects and finals and stuff."

to which i responded, "coleman, it's a lost cause."

i need some good lovin'.

once again, mad props to KT G and her super-special skills in the hair-care department. 

word.

and friggin A, i need a break.

i got to meet adam cohen.
i got to touch adam cohen.
adam cohen signed my book and sang to me in french.

holy shit, life is good.

until the next morning when shit falls from teh sky.
and i spent mother's day in bayou le batre with my senile and very sick grandmother.  miserable.

and i have a migraine.  and apparently a physics test tomorrow. ha ha...NO.

fuck this shit, i'm going to bed.

but i met adam cohen. score.

this shit is over!!

and tonight i get to see low millions and the wonderful genius that is adam freaking cohen!!

i just LURVE it when ms. carole decides to call rehearsals at the last minute at 7 pm the night before the AP History exam.

score.

if all my friends jumped off a bridge right now, i'd follow them.
MAD PROPS TO KT G FO' HER HAIR-CUTTING SKILLZ!
